Articles.Content: The depths of my addiction was unknown until now. I need this forum. It's my precious. Don't ever do that again.

6 minutes ago, I_Killed_Jeb said:

The depths of my addiction was unknown until now. I need this forum. It's my precious. Don't ever do that again.

Agreed.  I can't even count the number of times I reflexively typed "forums.kerbalspaceprogram.com" into the URL and hit ENTER only to then realize the forums were down for maintenance.

Glad to see it fully back in action! The interface is very clean and polished, more like 2015. Ok, to test out the new features: 

<p>Excited</p>

I hope the loading time is just teething problems?

Waiting 10-15 seconds between pages is a bit tedious.

3 minutes ago, MarvinKitFox said:

I hope the loading time is just teething problems?

Waiting 10-15 seconds between pages is a bit tedious.

What loading problems?

@MarvinKitFox

The loading time will get faster. It takes a bit of time for the system to auto-adjust.
Excellent! Must fix my signature, now.
well at least the servers are back for the forums
Wow, I never realized how much time I spend on these forums until now.
They need to fix all BB codes now ...
Woo! I like the imgur album implementation. It's pretty similar to the Vbulletin format but it just seems a tad cleaner. I don't know.

31 minutes ago, I_Killed_Jeb said:

The depths of my addiction was unknown until now. I need this forum. It's my precious. Don't ever do that again.

This.

 

This weekend I've been entertaining my 3 year old, The weather has been foul so it's been a stay indoors, watch TV, play with trains, sword fights and what not. Every so often, (read: every hour/too often), I go through my at home ritual of go to kitchen, switch kettle on, go outside, have cigarette, back inside, make coffee, sit down at computer, click favourites, Facebook (ugh I know right), old (10 years a member) clan website (it's dead tbh but habit), KSP forums to check replies to my own posts and any updates.

 

EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. KSP forums are down. Why do I keep clicking goddamit lol. It's like when I run out of milk trying to make coffee. I still autopilot to the fridge knowing full well there's no milk in there and it's black coffee until I can brave the outside and fight my way to the shops.

On the plus side, it appears that the editor interface works properly for me again.  A while back the old one got all buggy for me, and I had to resort to pasting everything in from Word. On the minus side, all that text I pasted in before is now a complete garble of un-parsed tags. It's not like what I said was of any importance, but it's kind of embarrassing to be responsible for such a mess. I hope it's just because  some things aren't fully implemented yet.
Finally I can look at Mission Reports and Some mods!

Buggy with bad gateways, slow as a snail on a warm piece of tar, and looks like a blind schoolkid made the layouts.

Edited November 29, 2015 by KasperVld
language filter

I think we can have bigger avatars now! I just updated mine to a high res version. 

 

--edit--

 

Just noticed that sig quotes don't show names any more

Not bad for a default installation.

Could do with reducing the buffer values on some of the divs to make better use of horizontal space.

Spoiler

bug fugguh spoiler 

y = 10
x = print(y / 25)
print("hi guys!")

new fonts and big

it all seems to work again.
Welp.  Ten 502 bad gateway (oh how I missed you) and a password lockout and reset later, I finally got on.  Progress!
Welcome back, forum.

How about not breaking all the links ever again? Also, why is the thread title now required on the link? It's long enough without it and it has a unique identifier, the topic does nothing but artificially bloat link lengths.
I've yet to see the desktop version, but the version on my phone is... I don't like it. Too much clutter. Makes me feel dyslexic.

Yay! We're back!

Testing Imgur integration:

That was easy. Cool!
"Back"

Ok. Fifty more minutes of bad gateways.  Why is my avatar messed up?  Why do I get an Email every time someone posts in this thread?  Is there another option for reply notification?  I unclicked notify me but am still getting Emails every time someone posts.  If someone has a fix for this put a note in a bottle and throw it in the ocean.  I'll probably get it before the bad gateway lets me back in here.

 

Now it says I can't edit my previous post.   Emoticons don't work?  (Angry, frustrated emoticon face)
